thread.title: Marco Anthony closes high school career with big performances
thread.title_full: Marco Anthony closes high school career with big performances

author: Jamie Oakes
title: Marco Anthony closes high school career with big performances
text:
Marco Anthony closes high school career with big performances Virginia signee Marco Anthony played his final high school basketball game on Tuesday night. (Photo: VirginiaSports.com) Virginia signee Marco Anthony played his final high school basketball game on Tuesday night. (What’s happening as UVa football ramps up 2018 recruiting efforts, the baseball season gets under way and Virginia basketball marches toward March? Make sure you’re in the loop — Take five seconds to Sign up for our FREE UVa Newsletter NOW !) And while it was in defeat in the playoffs, it was another in an impressive line of box scores to close his career at San Antonio (Texas) Holmes. 
Sad moment for San Antonio High School ball, as we see @MarcoJAnthony check out for the last time in his high school career! #AlamoCityHoops pic.twitter.com/fTjmVtA9E4 — Alamo City Hoops (@AlamoCityHoops1) February 22, 2017 Holmes fell to Wagner, 68-45 to end the season.Anthony scored 30 of those 45 points and he added 12 rebounds in defeat. Here are the Virginia signee’s box score totals for the month of February: February 21: 30 points, 12 rebounds February 17: 25 points, 17 rebounds, 5 assists February 14: 44 points, 13 rebounds, 5 assists February 10: 36 points, 15 rebounds, 5 assists February 8: 24 points, 10 rebounds, 3 assists February 3: 27 points, 15 rebounds, 3 assists The 6-foot-6, 220-pound wing has a bright future ahead of him Charlottesville. Author
